scripts.setup:backend-env: echo VITE_SUPABASE_URL=your_supabase_url > .env && echo VITE_SUPABASE_KEY=your_supabase_key >> .env && echo GEMINI_API_KEY=your_gemini_key >> .env
scripts.setup:venv: cd ai-engine && python -m venv .venv && .venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:venv && npm run setup:backend-env
